Question & Options:
Which of the following statements are true regarding the original soundtrack album of the movie 'Finding Nemo' released in 2003?
Options:
A. A) The original soundtrack album features music specifically composed for the film.
B. B) 'Finding Nemo' has no original soundtrack album.
C. C) The soundtrack includes various artists from different genres.
D. D) The original soundtrack is a collection of music specifically created for 'Finding Nemo'.

Which of the following statements about the soundtrack of the movie 'Finding Nemo' (2003) are correct?
Options:
A. A. Thomas Newman composed the soundtrack for 'Finding Nemo'.
B. B. The soundtrack was produced by Hans Zimmer.
C. C. 'Finding Nemo' features an original score by Thomas Newman.
D. D. The movie's soundtrack received critical acclaim.
